title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 761.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 761.1 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) This Part shall
apply to certified home health agencies, long term home health care programs
and AIDS home care programs, hereafter also referred to in this Part as the
agency. (b) Certified home health
agencies must be established by the Public Health Council and possess a
certificate of approval issued by the commissioner, hereafter referred to in
this Part as an operating certificate. (c) Long term home health care programs must
be approved by the commissioner and possess a certificate of authorization
issued by the commissioner, hereinafter referred to as an operating
certificate. If a long term home health care program is authorized by the
commissioner to provide an AIDS home care program, the long term home health
care program operating certificate shall state such authorization. (d) An AIDS home care program provided by an
AIDS center hospital shall be approved by the commissioner and shall possess a
certificate of authorization issued by the commissioner, hereafter referred to
as an operating certificate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
761.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
